bug.author: junrushao1994
bug.summary: A typo in word embedding tutorial
bug.description: In our word embedding <denchmark-link:https://gluon-nlp.mxnet.io/model_zoo/word_embeddings/index.html>tutorial</denchmark-link> , it looks like should be .

comments.comment: And --max-vocab-size in run_all.sh should be --analogy-max-vocab-size. Do we have CI run on this tutorial?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/junrushao1994>@junrushao1994</denchmark-link> thanks for finding them. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/leezu>@leezu</denchmark-link> would be interested. We run the python scripts but not the scripts or the command lines.
